thread.title: Giants cornerback Amukamara out 2-4 weeks with chest injury
thread.title_full: Giants cornerback Amukamara out 2-4 weeks with chest injury

author: wtopstaff
title: Giants cornerback Amukamara out 2-4 weeks with chest injury
text:
Home » News » Sports » NFL » Giants cornerback Amukamara out… Giants cornerback Amukamara out 2-4 weeks with chest injury By The Associated Press  36 pm 
EAST RUTHERFORD, N.J. (AP) — New York Giants cornerback Prince Amukamara is going to miss two to four weeks because of a chest injury. 
Giants coach Tom Coughlin disclosed the pectoral injury before Thursday’s practice for Monday night’s game at Philadelphia. Amukamara was hurt in the victory over the San Francisco 49ers on Sunday night. 
Jayron Hosley is expected to replace Amukamara, who leads the team with seven passes defended. Hosley started against Washington when Dominique Rodgers-Cromartie was out with a concussion. 
The Giants also signed cornerback Brandon McGee and offensive lineman Xavier Proctor to their practice squad. To make room, the team terminated the contracts of offensive lineman Adam Gettis and tight end Dominique Jones. Topics:
